item.description:
2nd Annual Fenway Pub
Crawl this Saturday Noon to Nine pm.

http://supahfans.com/...

If you are at the Futures at Fenway Game and want to track us
down, text me for our location: 617-838-3337.

We're roughly following this schedule:

12 Noon: The Lower Depths
1 pm: Eastern Standard
2 pm: Cask'n Flagon
3 pm: Bleacher Bar
4 pm: Game On!
5 pm: Boston Beerworks
6 pm: Who's on First
7 pm: Jerry Remy's
8 pm: The Baseball Tavern

Finishing at 9ish with some freebies/give-aways at The Baseball
Tavern.

If Natives are interested in the Pub Crawl shirt, we're doing a
$10 special on the Fenway Drinking Team shirt all Saturday.

I hope to see you in Fenway Saturday!

Coach Kevin
SupahFans Streetwear
470 Comm Ave/Kenmore Square
1 block east of T Stop
866-SupahFans
item.name: 2nd Annual Fenway Pub Crawl
